feed.title: Investbrain Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.3
entry.content:
This newest release brings a major new feature: Investbrain API (docs)

What's Changed

  • feat: Add Investbrain API capabilities by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/56
  • fix: Ensures storage path permissions are set in entry script by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.4
entry.content:
This should be the last in a series of incremental updates to the dockerfile and compose files resulting in a streamlined self-hosting experience!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: size and speed improvements to Dockerfile by @Karjack182 in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/65
  • fix: support mariadb in sync:daily-change by @dataoscar in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/64
  • refactor: storage scaffolding and save generated app key to file by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/69

New Contributors

  • @Karjack182 made their first contribution in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/65
  • @dataoscar made their first contribution in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/64

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.4...v1.1.5

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.6
entry.content:
[!WARNING]
Upgrade to the latest Investbrain (>= v1.1.6) immediately. A downstream package (livewire/volt) contains a critical RCE vulnerability. For more information on this vulnerability, you can reference CVE-2025-27517.

What's Changed

  • chore: upgrade livewire/volt to >= 1.7.0 due to CVE-2025-27517 (and upgrade other composer deps)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.5...v1.1.6

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: adds experimental pgsql compatibility by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/72
  • feat: simplify self host install by removing asset_url env by @hackeresq in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/75

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.1.6...v1.1.7
